verbs.description: [ARG1: ron clark academy success] [V: comes] [ARGM-MNR: at a price few schools can afford] it was the way the teacher jumped on his desk refusing to be ignored pushing a catatonic class beyond the complacency of ca n’t to a chapter of no excuses that hooked parents willie thornton clark ron clark baseball charlene avril kim bearden barack obama ron clark academy harlem turner field rca
